Recovery tool downloads available channel backups from Olympus servers and uses them to reimburse locked funds back into your on-chain wallet. 

You should expect a refunding Groestlcoin Testnet transaction shortly after starting it if you do have lost channels with some locked funds, otherwise nothing will happen.

Using this tool does not affect open channels currently present on this phone.

Hivemind deposits are disabled

It will be possible to deposit funds to Hivemind if Drivechain soft-fork gets activated.

Hivemind is a Peer-to-Peer Oracle Protocol which absorbs accurate data into a blockchain so that Groestlcoin TestNet-users can speculate in Prediction Markets.

These markets have the potential to revolutionize the emergence and diffusion of knowledge in society.

Trusted Groestlcoin Testnet node

Once an address is provided wallet will only be using your trusted node instead of random ones.

You are trying to fulfill a Lightning payment request but there are currently no open payment channels in this wallet.

How to fix this?

- Open an outgoing channel with a peer of your choice, this requires some Testnet Groestlcoins to be present in this wallet as they will be used for funding.

- Purchase an incoming channel with an immediately spendable balance on your side.

Receiving off-chain Lightning funds requires you to have at least one payment channel. There are two ways to accomplish this:

1. Open an outgoing channel with a peer of your choice and spend some Lightning funds first to make room for incoming payments.

2. Order an incoming channel which would allow you to receive Lightning payments right away.
